title: Perfect 2 Bd/2 Bth and Perfect location. Sparkling Pool and More!
map_address: 141 Golf Club Road near Contra Costa Blvd.
posting_body: ['Briarwood Apartments.', 'Where Comfort Meets Convenience.', 'Beautiful Community in Pleasant Hill and The PERFECT Location!', 'AVAILABLE NOW!', 'Fantastic, upstairs, 880 Sq.', 'Ft. 2 bedroom, 2 bath Apartment Home is ready and available for an immediate move in.', 'This spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bath floorplan features large rooms, large closets, fully equipped kitchen, extra large storage closet on your balcony and a beautiful location that is close to all amenities, and so much more!', 'Enjoy coming home to this spacious Apartment Home surrounded by beautiful lush landscaping.', 'Peacefulness awaits you in private surroundings at the most convenient location in Pleasant Hill.', 'Close and easy access to everything that you can walk to!', '2 Bdrm. /', '2 Bath / 880 Sq.', 'Ft. / $2345', 'COME BY OR CALL FOR YOUR PERSONAL TOUR TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'Briarwood Apartments', '141 Golf Club Road', 'Pleasant Hill, CA 94523', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'VISIT OUR WEBSITE AT:', '<URL>', 'Office Hours', 'Monday to Friday - 9 am to 6 pm', 'Saturday: BY APPOINTMENT', 'Sunday: BY APPOINTMENT', 'Property Description -', 'Welcome home to Briarwood Apartments, where comfort meets convenience.', 'We are located in the heart of Pleasant Hill and in walking distance to shopping at the Sun Valley Mall, The Veranda, Safeway.', 'Diablo Valley College, highways 680, 24 and 4 are 1 minute to get to.', 'Pleasant Hill and Concord BART and A/C Transit are only moments away.', 'Great restaurants and entertainment are all close by.', 'Contra Costa and Iron Horse trails are very close for your outdoor enjoyment.', 'We offer one and two bedroom, two bath apartment homes nestled among large redwood trees and lush landscaping.', 'Call or come visit us today for your tour!', 'Apartment Home features -', '* Updated appliances in kitchen and updates throughout home', '* Designated parking', '* Air Conditioning', '* Gas Paid!', '* Resident responsible for water/trash/sewer, based on number of occupants', '* Ceiling Fans', '*', 'Large closets and abundant cabinetry', '*', 'Large storage on patio/balcony', 'Community features -', '* Assigned covered parking', '* Swimming pool and sun area', '* Beautifully landscaped', '* Lg. sunny grass area with gazebo for relaxing, surrounded by large redwood trees and lush landscaping', '* Centrally located laundry center', '* Professional and responsive on-site Management and Maintenance', '*', 'After hours Maintenance', '* Pet friendly!', '- Call for terms and policy', '* Flexible lease terms', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
